{{cpp/ranges/stride_view/iterator/title|operator*}}
{{cpp/ranges/stride_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|1=
constexpr decltype(auto) operator*() const;
}}

Returns the elements into {{c|V}} the underlying iterator {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} points to.

Equivalent to: {{c|return *current_;}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The current element.

===Notes===
{{c|operator-&gt;}} is not provided.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;ranges&gt;

int main()
{
    constexpr static auto v = {'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e'};
    constexpr auto view{v {{!}} std::views::stride(2)};
    constexpr auto iter{view.begin() + 1};
    static_assert(*iter == 'c');
    static_assert(*(view.begin() + 2) == 'e');
}
}}
